scripts.build:production: npm run paraglide:compile && dotenvx run --env-file=.env.production -- vite build
scripts.ci:test:e2e: env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" bash -lc 'xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args="-screen 0 1280x960x24" npx playwright test --reporter=list' --
scripts.dev:localhost: npm run paraglide:compile && NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=localhost dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- bash -lc 'E2E_DISABLE_HMR=1 E2E_DISABLE_WATCH=1 vite dev --host 0.0.0.0 --port 7090'
scripts.dev:localhost:tinylicious: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=localhost dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- npx tinylicious --port 7092
scripts.github:test:e2e: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=localhost dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" bash -lc 'xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args="-screen 0 1280x960x24" playwright test --reporter=github,line "$@"' --
scripts.coverage:report: vitest run --project unit --project integration --coverage && npm run coverage:merge
scripts.test: npm run coverage:move-to-backup && NODE_ENV=test dotenvx run --overload --env-file=.env.test -- vitest run --project unit --project integration --coverage && npm run coverage:backup && npm run test:e2e && npm run coverage:backup && npm run coverage:e2e && npm run coverage:backup && npm run coverage:merge && npm run coverage:backup
scripts.test:e2e: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=localhost dotenvx run --overload --env-file=.env.test -- env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" bash -lc 'xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args="-screen 0 1280x960x24" npx playwright test --reporter=list "$@"' --
scripts.test:e2e:basic: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=localhost dotenvx run --overload --env-file=.env.test -- env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" bash -lc 'xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args="-screen 0 1280x960x24" playwright test ./e2e/basic --reporter=list "$@"' --
scripts.test:e2e:debug: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=localhost dotenvx run --overload --env-file=.env.test -- env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" bash -lc 'xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args="-screen 0 1280x960x24" npx playwright test --reporter=list --debug "$@"' --
scripts.test:e2e:ui: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=localhost dotenvx run --overload --env-file=.env.test -- env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" bash -lc 'xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args="-screen 0 1280x960x24" npx playwright test --reporter=list --ui "$@"' --
scripts.test:e2e:xvfb: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=localhost dotenvx run --overload --env-file=.env.test -- env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" bash -lc 'xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args="-screen 0 1280x960x24" npx playwright test --reporter=list "$@"' --
scripts.test:polling: NODE_ENV=test TEST_ENV=localhost dotenvx run --overload --env-file=.env.test -- env PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" bash -lc 'xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args="-screen 0 1280x960x24" npx playwright test ./e2e/env/env-polling-analysis-test-removability-a1b2c3d4.spec.ts --reporter=list' --
